```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(DBI)
con <- dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), "SQL Server (DSN)")
```

```{r}
dbGetQuery(con, "Select top 10 * from flights")
```

```{sql, connection = con}
SELECT "carrier", COUNT(*) AS "n"
FROM "flights"
GROUP BY "carrier"
ORDER BY "n" DESC
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
db_flights <- tbl(con, "flights")
```

```{r}
db_flights %>%
  tally
```

```{r}
db_flights %>%
  group_by(carrier) %>% 
  tally %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) 
  
```

```{r}
db_flights %>%
  group_by(carrier) %>% 
  tally %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  show_query()
  
```
